titles.title: A bill to prohibit the construction of natural gas compressor stations as part of a project that would lead to or facilitate natural gas exports.
Community Outreach, Maintenance, and Preservation by Restricting Export Stations from Subverting Our Regulations Act
Community Outreach, Maintenance, and Preservation by Restricting Export Stations from Subverting Our Regulations Act
COMPRESSOR Act
COMPRESSOR Act
Community Outreach, Maintenance, and Preservation by Restricting Export Stations from Subverting Our Regulations Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Community Outreach, Maintenance, and Preservation by Restricting Export Stations from Subverting Our Regulations Act or the COMPRESSOR Act
This bill prohibits the construction of any natural gas compressor station as part of a project that would lead to the export of natural gas or facilitate the export of natural gas.
